title: Open Source Developer Fundraising: Importance and Methods
description: Learn about open source developer fundraising, its importance, methods like crowdfunding and corporate sponsorships, and the challenges faced. Explore how the community can support the sustainability of open source projects.
keywords: open source fundraising, developer fundraising, crowdfunding platforms, corporate sponsorship, GitHub Sponsors, Open Collective, Mozilla Foundation, Linux Foundation, sustainable open source, open source community
